definition: the Xia or Hsia dynasty c. 2000 BC/Xia of the Sixteen Kingdoms (407-432)/surname Xia
classifier for a ream of paper
to order/to command/an order/warrant/writ/to cause/to make sth happen/virtuous/honorific title/season/government position (old)
camp/barracks/battalion/to build/to operate/to manage/to strive for

sentences.english: I was about twelve years old, and attending a summer camp in the Green Mountains called Camp Challenge.
sentences.chinese: 那時我十二歲，參加了綠山的一個夏令營，即挑戰營。

sentences.english: Nowadays, summer camp is even more specialized.
sentences.chinese: 現而今，暑期夏令營則變得更爲專向化。

sentences.english: This camp as a real life-changing experience that I ill never forget.
sentences.chinese: 這次夏令營真實的生活體驗令我永遠難忘。

sentences.english: This camp was a real life-changing experience that I will never forget.
sentences.chinese: 這次夏令營真實生活體驗令永遠難忘。

sentences.english: This summer, I was supposed to go to my favorite camp.
sentences.chinese: 今年夏天，我本來是要參加自己最喜愛的夏令營的。

sentences.english: He developed the first rules for a summer boys' baseball program.
sentences.chinese: 他是第一個完善了少年棒球夏令營活動條例的人。

sentences.english: They just came this week from the ABCD Camp.
sentences.chinese: 他們這周剛從ABCD夏令營回來。

sentences.english: This summer, I attended summer camp, the most memorable had to be Deng Changcheng.
sentences.chinese: 今年暑假，我參加了夏令營，最難忘的要屬登長城了。

sentences.english: A total of 72 English teachers in Fuyuan participated in the summer camp.
sentences.chinese: 今年夏令營的活動對象爲老師，參加老師達72人。

sentences.english: This year, a variety of summer camps are proving popular with students and parents.
sentences.chinese: 今年，各種各樣的夏令營確實受到學生和家長的歡迎。

sentences.english: Ali: I need to get some money to pay for summer camp.
sentences.chinese: 我需要弄點錢去參加夏令營。

sentences.english: But, usually I'm a camp counsellor, so, you know.
sentences.chinese: 不過，我一般都是作爲夏令營的輔導員參與項目的。

sentences.english: This cake was made for Dragon's World Chinese Summer Camp's fund-raising for Taiwan's hurricane.
sentences.chinese: 這個蛋糕是爲龍林中文夏令營爲臺灣水災募捐而做的。

sentences.english: I need to some money to -summer camp.
sentences.chinese: 我需要一些錢支付夏令營的費用。

sentences.english: Shanghai kids' sexed camp fails to excite.
sentences.chinese: 上海兒童性教育夏令營無人問津。

definition: student/member of an institution of learning/officer cadet
(to be done) by (a certain date)/lasting (a certain time)
to have an informal discussion/CL:次[ci4],個|个[ge4]
